description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nHunter's Season:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it deals damage to a random enemy equal to 35% of the attack's damage and afflicts them with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}. This effect repeats once for each {RACE_Hunter} fighting on your side.
name: Servant Glaive
